name: shortcut_execute
description: Execute a named shortcut (atajo). Shortcuts are pre-configured command templates identified by a /name. Returns the shortcut prompt and configuration so the LLM can carry out the instructions. Type /shortcut-name in chat or call this tool with the shortcut name.

name.description: Shortcut name (with or without leading /). Example: 'open-mcp-docs' or '/open-mcp-docs'
